pullrequest.title: fix wrong node weights caused by buffer overflow bug

content.raw:
A couple of minor code check errors:

```
./gazebo/common/ColladaLoader.cc:1997:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/common/ColladaLoader.cc:2064:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
```
